- Material: White PVC sink drain with slip-joint fittings; metal sink strainer nut.  
- Configuration: Tailpiece from sink connects to a vertical/branch drain with a horizontal run toward the wall (likely a double-sink setup).  
- Condition: No visible leaks or corrosion at joints in photo; joints appear dry.  
- Obstructions: Cabinet clutter (cleaners, bags) reduces access and may hide leaks.  
- Recommendation: Confirm presence and proper installation of the P-trap; tidy area and recheck for leaks after running water.
